creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription:
At edge: [67] (number of the pieces in the series);
Suō\'s poem (followed by detailed explanation):
(You offered your arm
To be my pillow 
In a manner as casual as 
A dream of spring night
But, I\'m afraid 
That people may rumor us)
{Haru no yo no
Yume bakari naru
Te-makura ni
Kai naku tata n
Na koso oshi kere}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Illustrations of the Hundred Poems by the Hundred Poets (Hyakunin isshu no uchi)
title: Illustration of the Suō no Naishi's Poem
